text:
@larryelder @RoyLam12222410 All Americans need to recognize communist #China regime is the one & only one to blame for our nation’s death & devastation caused by the #WuhanCoronaVirus 🇨🇳 

Americans who lost loved ones, lost job or businesses because of #coronavirus, blame #China & its leader #XiJinping!
